title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS to showcase skills, projects, and professional background.
detailedDescription: This project is a fully responsive and modern personal portfolio website built using React for dynamic user experience and Tailwind CSS for streamlined styling. It includes multiple sections such as About, Projects, Skills, and Contact. The site also integrates smooth scrolling, animations, and dark/light mode toggles to enhance user interaction.
features: Responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop
Interactive UI components with smooth animations
Contact form integration with backend API
challenges: Implementing smooth animations across different browsers
Ensuring consistent performance on mobile devices
Managing state effectively in a complex UI
